JOB DESCRIPTION:
We are currently seeking full time Software Developer with 6 to 7 years of Industry experience. To be successful in this role,  you should be able to independently understand the functional requirements and write functional code. You must be a motivated,  self- starter,  self- learner & should possess strong customer service and technical problem solving skills.

Post: Software Lead

Qualification: Any Graduate

Experience: 6- 7 Years

Job Location: Pune.

Skills & Experience Required

 Good understanding of the Web technologies

 Good understanding of the databases (MySql)

 Excellent coding skills in Core Java,  PHP & Android

 Has participated in requirement gathering and analysis with clients

 Has participated in designing the products /  solutions

 Can collaborate with internal teams to produce software design

 Able to mentor Junior Team members

 Provide inputs & participate in upgrading,  configuring and debugging existing systems

 Need to have basic knowledge of Linux operating system

 Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Productivity /  Efficiency

 Leverages individual and team knowledge and expertise,  knowledgebase,  documentation and other information sources to help solve problems

 Good time management skills and demonstrated ability to effectively prioritize own workload

 Able to troubleshoot,  debug and reproduce customer scenarios

 Logical thinker with analytical and problem solving skills

 Learns rapidly through both formal and informal training

 Required to be flexible,  detail- oriented and organized with the ability to multi- task
